prompts: Create a legendary Pokemon that can control wind and storms.
I want a mythical creature with a swirling cloud body and vibrant colors.
Generate a powerful flying-type Pokemon with unique green and purple patterns.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a tornado with dynamic features.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a storm god with a majestic appearance.
Design a creature that represents the fury of nature with an ethereal look.
Give me a Pokemon that has a playful yet fierce personality, soaring through the skies.
